Design patterns

I read on modern topics in Java software development, but also in other technologies to have a broader view of how things evolve. My work experience has made my an all-around developer; I did web development as well as back-end development and worked a lot on non-functional requirements (performance, security, production readiness, etc.) to impact maintenance cost of organizations.
